mapper.insert: insert into content(c_no, c_name, c_level, c_able, c_price, c_content) values (#{c_no},#{c_name},#{c_level},#{c_able},#{c_price},#{c_content} )
mapper.select: select DATE_FORMAT(sub_date,'%Y-%m-%d') sub_date, sub_price from subscribe group by DATE_FORMAT(sub_date,'%Y-%m-%d')
mapper.insert: insert into cart(cr_no, cr_cnt, cr_regdate, cr_m_no, cr_c_no, cnt) values (#{cr_no}, 1, now(), #{cr_m_no}, #{cr_c_no},#{cnt})
mapper.select: select c_no, c_name, c_level, cnt from content a left outer join (select * from cart) b on a.c_no = b.cr_c_no
SELECT count(*) FROM cart WHERE (cr_m_no, cr_c_no) IN (SELECT cr_m_no, cr_c_no FROM cart where cr_m_no=#{cr_m_no} and cr_c_no=#{cr_c_no} and cnt=#{cnt})
